name: Clear Your Head
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 48 Compo. I couldn't get the Web build to work so unfortunately I only have the download option.

Clear Your Head is a short platformer about an entity that must dismiss thoughts from its host's head so the host can have the deepest sleep possible. The more thoughts you dismiss, the deeper the host's sleep. However, make sure you hurry as your host will be falling asleep in 2 minutes.

Controls:

Left - A or Left arrow

Right - D or Right Arrow

Jump - Space
